text:
#IntoAmerica: In the debate over Confederate monuments, @caroranwill argues the virtue of her existence is a monument in and of itself. 

She and @trymainelee discuss why it’s time for the monuments to come down. https://t.co/oJUCqnoVQs https://t.co/YqQMLmOVml
